short_summary: The department is requesting delivery at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia of 1000 units of NSN 6145-01-5933291 special purpose electrical cables
description: The ministry is requesting delivery at both Ministry of Defense locations of electrical cables. Suppliers require to provide a quotation. Parts no: EPD-DND-21536, GLNP: 06090.
duration_in_months: Our time lustometrics indicates that the type of procuration required will span 2 to 5 months.
